headline: Omdia: 5G Standalone Networks and RedCap Devices Poised to Transform IoT Landscape in 2025
summary: LONDON, September 30, 2025--New analysis from Omdia reveals that 2025 is set to be a breakout year for 5G Standalone (SA) network deployments and RedCap device adoption, unlocking substantial opportunities for IoT applications across industries.
